author: USA TODAY, Adrianna Rodriguez, USA TODAY
title: Contact tracing helped end the Ebola outbreak. Public health experts say it can stop COVID-19, too.
description: The World Health Organization breaks down contact tracing into three basic steps: Contact identification, contact listing and contact follow-up.
content:
A Los Angeles County test is looking for pivotal information about whether people can develop immunity that helps them fight off future infections.
USA TODAY
